message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product.  Given its value, I'm asking for $13,000.  I think you'll be very pleased with it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you meet me there?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your offer, but I can't go lower than $11,500. This product is truly top-notch and will bring you a lot of value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Can you meet me there?
